metadata.title: Ad Franc. Hotomani Franco-Galliam Antonii Matharelli ... responsio : in qua agitur de initio Regni Fra[n]ciae, successione regum, publicis negotiis, & politia, ex fide Annalium nostrorum, Germaniaeque, & aliarum gentium, Graecísque & Latinis scriptoribus.

metadata.description: "Iudicium Papirii Massoni De Libello Hotomani," p. 6-9

Matharel himself "probably had little to do with writing the pamphlet. The moving spirit and legal mind behind the attack was in fact Papire Masson ..."--D.R. Kelley, François Hotman (Princeton, N.J., 1973), p. 253
Hauser, Les sources de l'histoire de France
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Uneven binding. Skewed text.
